text: qalt al'aerab (whm albdw): amanaa biallah warasulih 'iymanana kamilaan qul lahum -ayha alnby-: laa tddaeu li'anfusikum al'iiman alkaml, wlkn qwlu: aslmna, walam yadkhul bed al'iiman fi qlwbkm, wa'iin tutieuu allah warasulah la ynqskm min thawab 'aemalakum shyyana. 'iina allah ghafur liman tab min dhnwbh, rahim bh. wafi alayat zjr liman yuzhr al'iyman, wamutabaeat alsnt, waemalh tashhad bkhlaf dhlk
